1.content: Your at school and shrunk to 1in unaware of what happened you look where you are .where did your shrink?
1.title: Beginning

15.content: While not a typical class what about shrinking in a study hall in that you are spending in the library. If the thought of being around so many books does not seem right how about shrinking in gym either in the gym itself or the locker room before or after class. Another option that is not really a class what about shrinking during lunch?
15.title: Other

choices: Aiden the hot guy working on a school project
Jesse the biggest nerd in school
151.content:
As you had a free period you decided to get some work done in the library. Finding a table to work at you see that the room is pretty empty of other students except a few hard liners that would rather have the quite of the library to the noise of the various study hall rooms around school. In fact beside yourself you only see Aiden an upperclassman who is considered to be one of the hottest guys in the entire school both male and female, who seemed to be working on a class project by himself. Behind the desk was the Librarian a thirty something hot blond who looked like she belonged in a commercial. Finally there was Jesse considered the biggest nerd in school who dressed oddly had messy brown hair and wore some oval rimmed glasses. Even freshmen like yourself picked on Jesse for how much of a nerd he for it seems his only redeeming quality was how smart he was.

Satisfied you would not disturbed as you worked the first ten minutes but as you went to get a book in the racks you suddenly felt dizzy and hand to sit down for a minute. You suddenly pass out and when you wake up you see than everything except the clothes that you were wear appeared to be gigantic. As you look around in shock at this the ground begins to shake as around the edge of the shelf walks.....
151.title: Library: Study Hall

info.brief_description: You for some reason shrink to 1in in class surrounded by giants
info.description:
Your name is Alex and your a freshman at your high school
You randomly shrunk to 1 inch and are confused,but were are you?
